document_data.name: Blackgorgons
document_data.mainbody: '''Blackgorgons''' was the tower home of [[Baskor Tranth]], a surly hard-drinking retired adventurer of significant magical repute, who settled in [[Suzail]], the capital of [[Cormyr]] as of the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20171021193611/https://candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_080910-04.htm| title = So Saith Ed Aug â€“ Oct 2004| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.Location: The grim-named wizardly tower stood on the southern side of [[Stonebow Street]], rising above [[Courtyard of Zathchos]] to the south from Blackgorgons, located in the middle os the city block. Stonebow Street's crossing with [[Torch Street]] was located one door east of the tower.
document_data.History: Blackgorgons was Baskor's home as early as the {{YearlinkName|1356}}. The tower contained it's masters impressive collection of [[spell]] [[scroll]]s that he was willing to trade.
